history.proof: intros d pl a H. shelve.

exceptions.exn: In environment d : preDTA pl : prec_list a : ad H : MapGet bool (pl_coacc d pl) a = Some true Unable to unify "prec_occur (prec_cons ?M1851 ?M1852 ?M1853) ?M1851" with "prec_occur pl a".

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (d : preDTA) (pl : prec_list) (a : ad), MapGet bool (pl_coacc d pl) a = Some true -> prec_occur pl a

Premises:
Inductive bool : Set := true : bool | false : bool
MapGet : forall A : Type, Map A -> ad -> option A
Inductive option (A : Type) : Type := Some : A -> option A | None : option A For Some: Arguments are renamed to A, a For Some: Argument A is implicit and maximally inserted For None: Argument A is implicit and maximally inserted For option: Argument scope is [type_scope] For Some: Argument scopes are [type_scope _] For None: Argument scope is [type_scope]
Inductive prec_list : Set := prec_cons : ad -> prec_list -> prec_list -> prec_list | prec_empty : prec_list
ad = N : Set
pl_coacc = fix pl_coacc (d : preDTA) (pl : prec_list) {struct pl} : Map bool := match pl with | prec_cons a la ls => map_replace bool (map_or (pl_coacc d la) (pl_coacc d ls)) a true | prec_empty => map_mini state d end : preDTA -> prec_list -> Map bool
preDTA = Map state : Set
Inductive prec_occur : prec_list -> ad -> Prop := prec_hd : forall (a : ad) (pl0 pl1 : prec_list), prec_occur (prec_cons a pl0 pl1) a | prec_int0 : forall (a b : ad) (pl0 pl1 : prec_list), prec_occur pl0 b -> prec_occur (prec_cons a pl0 pl1) b | prec_int1 : forall (a b : ad) (pl0 pl1 : prec_list), prec_occur pl1 b -> prec_occur (prec_cons a pl0 pl1) b
pl_coacc_contain_coacc_ads : forall (d : preDTA) (p : prec_list) (a : ad), prec_occur p a -> prec_list_ref_ok p d -> MapGet bool (pl_coacc d p) a = Some true
pl_coacc_def_ok : forall (d : preDTA) (pl : prec_list), ensemble_base state d (pl_coacc d pl)
coacc_nxt : forall (d : preDTA) (a0 a1 a2 : ad) (s1 s2 : state) (pl : prec_list) (c : ad), MapGet state d a2 = Some s2 -> MapGet state d a1 = Some s1 -> MapGet prec_list s1 c = Some pl -> prec_occur pl a2 -> coacc d a0 a1 -> coacc d a0 a2
predta_coacc_contain_coacc_ads_2 : forall (d : preDTA) (a0 a1 a2 : ad) (s1 s2 : state) (pl : prec_list) (c : ad), MapGet state d a2 = Some s2 -> MapGet state d a1 = Some s1 -> MapGet prec_list s1 c = Some pl -> prec_occur pl a2 -> coacc d a0 a1 -> predta_coacc_contain_coacc_ads_def_0 d a0 a1 -> predta_coacc_contain_coacc_ads_def_0 d a0 a2
coacc_transitive_1 : forall (d : preDTA) (a0 a1 a2 : ad) (s1 s2 : state) (pl : prec_list) (c : ad), MapGet state d a2 = Some s2 -> MapGet state d a1 = Some s1 -> MapGet prec_list s1 c = Some pl -> prec_occur pl a2 -> coacc d a0 a1 -> coacc_transitive_def d a0 a1 -> coacc_transitive_def d a0 a2
preDTA_ref_ok = fun d : preDTA => forall (a : ad) (s : state) (c : ad) (pl : prec_list) (b : ad), MapGet state d a = Some s -> MapGet prec_list s c = Some pl -> prec_occur pl b -> exists s0 : state, MapGet state d b = Some s0 : preDTA -> Prop
Inductive coacc : preDTA -> ad -> ad -> Prop := coacc_id : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (s : state), MapGet state d a = Some s -> coacc d a a | coacc_nxt : forall (d : preDTA) (a0 a1 a2 : ad) (s1 s2 : state) (pl : prec_list) (c : ad), MapGet state d a2 = Some s2 -> MapGet state d a1 = Some s1 -> MapGet prec_list s1 c = Some pl -> prec_occur pl a2 -> coacc d a0 a1 -> coacc d a0 a2
st_coacc_contain_coacc_ads : forall (d : preDTA) (s : state) (c : ad) (p : prec_list) (a : ad), state_ref_ok s d -> MapGet prec_list s c = Some p -> prec_occur p a -> MapGet bool (st_coacc d s) a = Some true
coacc_ind : forall P : preDTA -> ad -> ad -> Prop, (forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (s : state), MapGet state d a = Some s -> P d a a) -> (forall (d : preDTA) (a0 a1 a2 : ad) (s1 s2 : state) (pl : prec_list) (c : ad), MapGet state d a2 = Some s2 -> MapGet state d a1 = Some s1 -> MapGet prec_list s1 c = Some pl -> prec_occur pl a2 -> coacc d a0 a1 -> P d a0 a1 -> P d a0 a2) -> forall (p : preDTA) (a a0 : ad), coacc p a a0 -> P p a a0
predta_coacc_contain_coacc_ads_0 : forall (d : preDTA) (a0 a : ad) (s : state) (c : ad) (p : prec_list) (b : ad) (m : Map bool), preDTA_ref_ok d -> MapGet state d a = Some s -> MapGet prec_list s c = Some p -> prec_occur p b -> ensemble_base state d m -> MapGet bool m a = Some true -> MapGet bool (predta_coacc d a0 m) b = Some true
predta_coacc_0_contain_coacc_ads : forall (d d' : preDTA) (a : ad) (s : state) (c : ad) (p : prec_list) (b : ad) (m : Map bool), preDTA_ref_ok_distinct d' d -> MapGet state d' a = Some s -> MapGet prec_list s c = Some p -> prec_occur p b -> ensemble_base state d' m -> MapGet bool m a = Some true -> MapGet bool (predta_coacc_0 d d' m) b = Some true
map_or_mapget_true_rd : forall (d : preDTA) (m0 m1 : Map bool) (a : ad), ensemble_base state d m0 -> ensemble_base state d m1 -> MapGet bool m1 a = Some true -> MapGet bool (map_or m0 m1) a = Some true
map_or_mapget_true_ld : forall (d : preDTA) (m0 m1 : Map bool) (a : ad), ensemble_base state d m0 -> ensemble_base state d m1 -> MapGet bool m0 a = Some true -> MapGet bool (map_or m0 m1) a = Some true
prec_list_ref_ok = fun (p : prec_list) (d : preDTA) => forall a : ad, prec_occur p a -> exists s : state, MapGet state d a = Some s : prec_list -> preDTA -> Prop
predta_coacc_contain_coacc_ads_3 : forall (d : preDTA) (a0 a1 : ad), coacc d a0 a1 -> preDTA_ref_ok d -> exists n : nat, MapGet bool (power (Map bool) (predta_coacc d a0) (map_mini state d) n) a1 = Some true
map_or_mapget_true_l : forall (m0 m1 : Map bool) (a : ad), domain_equal bool bool m0 m1 -> MapGet bool m0 a = Some true -> MapGet bool (map_or m0 m1) a = Some true
map_or_mapget_true_r : forall (m0 m1 : Map bool) (a : ad), domain_equal bool bool m0 m1 -> MapGet bool m0 a = Some true -> MapGet bool (map_or m1 m0) a = Some true
map_or_mapget_true_inv : forall (m0 m1 : Map bool) (a : ad), MapGet bool (map_or m0 m1) a = Some true -> MapGet bool m0 a = Some true \/ MapGet bool m1 a = Some true
map_replace_mapget_ins_true_1 : forall (m : Map bool) (a a' : ad), MapGet bool m a = Some true -> MapGet bool (map_replace bool m a' true) a = Some true
map_replace_mapget_true_inv : forall (m : Map bool) (a b : ad), MapGet bool (map_replace bool m a true) b = Some true -> b = a \/ MapGet bool m b = Some true
prec_in_dta = fun (d : preDTA) (p : prec_list) => exists (s : state) (a c : ad), MapGet state d a = Some s /\ MapGet prec_list s c = Some p : preDTA -> prec_list -> Prop
predta_coacc = fun (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (m : Map bool) => map_replace bool (predta_coacc_0 d d m) a true : preDTA -> ad -> Map bool -> Map bool
essence_list = fun (l : term_list) (d : preDTA) (pl : prec_list) => match l with | tnil => 1 | tcons _ _ => match pl with | prec_cons _ _ _ => taille_0 pl + S (term_high_0 l) * S (DTA_taille d) | prec_empty => 1 end end : term_list -> preDTA -> prec_list -> nat
map_mini_mapget_true : forall (A : Set) (x : Map A) (a : ad), MapGet bool (map_mini A x) a = Some true -> False
invar_1_0 : forall (d : preDTA) (a c : ad) (t : term_list) (n : nat) (s : state) (p : prec_list), MapGet state d a = Some s -> MapGet prec_list s c = Some p -> rec_list_terms d p t n = true -> rec_term d a (app c t) (S n) = true
semantic_equiv_0_2 : forall (d : preDTA) (a a' : ad) (l : term_list) (n : nat) (s : state) (p : prec_list), rec_term d a (app a' l) (S n) = true -> MapGet state d a = Some s -> MapGet prec_list s a' = Some p -> rec_list_terms d p l n = true
prec_in_dta_diff = fun (d : preDTA) (p : prec_list) (a : ad) => exists (s : state) (b c : ad), MapGet state d b = Some s /\ MapGet prec_list s c = Some p /\ a <> b : preDTA -> prec_list -> ad -> Prop
st_coacc = fix st_coacc (d : preDTA) (s : state) {struct s} : Map bool := match s with | @M0 _ => map_mini state d | @M1 _ _ pl => pl_coacc d pl | @M2 _ x y => map_or (st_coacc d x) (st_coacc d y) end : preDTA -> state -> Map bool
semantic_equiv_0_4 : forall (d : preDTA) (a a' : ad) (l : term_list) (n : nat) (s : state), MapGet state d a = Some s -> rec_term d a (app a' l) (S n) = true -> exists p : prec_list, MapGet prec_list s a' = Some p
semantic_equiv_0_3 : forall (d : preDTA) (a a' : ad) (l : term_list) (n : nat), rec_term d a (app a' l) (S n) = true -> exists s : state, MapGet state d a = Some s
Inductive reconnaissance : preDTA -> ad -> term -> Prop := rec_dta : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (ladj : state), MapGet state d a = Some ladj -> state_reconnait d ladj t -> reconnaissance d a t with state_reconnait : preDTA -> state -> term -> Prop := rec_st : forall (d : preDTA) (s : state) (c : ad) (tl : term_list) (l : prec_list), MapGet prec_list s c = Some l -> liste_reconnait d l tl -> state_reconnait d s (app c tl) with liste_reconnait : preDTA -> prec_list -> term_list ->...-> liste_reconnait d (prec_cons a la ls) (tcons hd tl)
map_replace_mapget_ins_true_0 : forall (m : Map bool) (a : ad) (b : bool), MapGet bool m a = Some b -> MapGet bool (map_replace bool m a true) a = Some true
predta_coacc_contain_coacc_ads_def_0 = fun (d : preDTA) (a0 a1 : ad) => coacc d a0 a1 -> preDTA_ref_ok d -> exists n : nat, MapGet bool (power (Map bool) (predta_coacc d a0) (map_mini state d) n) a1 = Some true : preDTA -> ad -> ad -> Prop
predta_coacc_contain_coacc_ads_1 : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (s : state), MapGet state d a = Some s -> predta_coacc_contain_coacc_ads_def_0 d a a
coacc_id : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (s : state), MapGet state d a = Some s -> coacc d a a
coacc_transitive_0 : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (s : state), MapGet state d a = Some s -> coacc_transitive_def d a a
mlrec_ind : forall (P : forall (p : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term), reconnaissance p a t -> Prop) (P0 : forall (p : preDTA) (s : state) (t : term), state_reconnait p s t -> Prop) (P1 : forall (p : preDTA) (p0 : prec_list) (t : term_list), liste_reconnait p p0 t -> Prop), (forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (ladj : state) (e : MapGet state d a = Some ladj) (s : state_reconnait d ladj t), P0 d ladj t s -> P d a t (rec_dta d a t ladj e s)) ->...-> forall (p : preDTA) (p0 : prec_list) (t : term_list) (l : liste_reconnait p p0 t), P1 p p0 t l
mreconnaissance_ind : forall (P : forall (p : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term), reconnaissance p a t -> Prop) (P0 : forall (p : preDTA) (s : state) (t : term), state_reconnait p s t -> Prop) (P1 : forall (p : preDTA) (p0 : prec_list) (t : term_list), liste_reconnait p p0 t -> Prop), (forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (ladj : state) (e : MapGet state d a = Some ladj) (s : state_reconnait d ladj t), P0 d ladj t s -> P d a t (rec_dta d a t ladj e s)) ->...-> forall (p : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (r : reconnaissance p a t), P p a t r
mstrec_ind : forall (P : forall (p : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term), reconnaissance p a t -> Prop) (P0 : forall (p : preDTA) (s : state) (t : term), state_reconnait p s t -> Prop) (P1 : forall (p : preDTA) (p0 : prec_list) (t : term_list), liste_reconnait p p0 t -> Prop), (forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (ladj : state) (e : MapGet state d a = Some ladj) (s : state_reconnait d ladj t), P0 d ladj t s -> P d a t (rec_dta d a t ladj e s)) ->...-> forall (p : preDTA) (s : state) (t : term) (s0 : state_reconnait p s t), P0 p s t s0
rec_dta : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (ladj : state), MapGet state d a = Some ladj -> state_reconnait d ladj t -> reconnaissance d a t

``` 
intros d pl a H.
apply prec_hd.
```
